MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY17 postcode area of Caersws, affecting properties in Llanwnog and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:15PM due to faulty equipment on the overhead line network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 8:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30PM on 12th April 2021.
